text: The Tenby International School network is a group of international schools in Malaysia which was founded in 1960 and admits children aged 3-18. There are schools in Ipoh, Penang, Setia Alam, Miri, Iskandar Puteri and Selangor. A new campus at Kota Kemuning opened in September 2018. ==References== Category:Education in Malaysia Category:Iskandar Puteri
title: Tenby International School
